Genuinely the best game I've ever played. The mechanics are amazing, the puzzles are great, the story is engaging, and It's funnier than any game I've seen. Especially considering it often goes on sale for $5 or less, this game and the first are a must have.

Uma obra de arte, puzzles muito divertidos e dinâmicos, história envolvente, mapas muito interessantes e personagens muito carismáticos, um dos melhores jogos já produzidos, um clássico mesmo nos dias de hoje
bloody brilliant game, very fun and well worth it
Foda mesmo hoje em dia.
Sehr schöne Physikrätsel zum Gehirn inside-out-klappen und eine erneut zynisch-bösartige GlaDOS, die mit ihren Spitzen die Immersion herstellt und vertieft. Klasse Coop-Multiplayer!
Absolutely excellent game, even better than the first.  I was surprised at its length and felt like it might be too long, but on a recent replay it was much faster and I wished it would never end.

Очень добротная игра! Решил поностальгировать (последний раз проходил лет так 10 назад) и заново открыл её для себя! Что первая, что вторая часть очень хороши. Лучше бы Вольво такими играми занимался, а не всякими кс го и дота.

On dit souvent qu'une suite ne pourrait jamais battre l'original. Et bien Portal 2 prouve le contraire: De meilleures graphismes, une durée de vie plus longue avec une histoire plus intéressante, rajouts de mécaniques comme les ponts de lumière, laser, gel...Portal 2 surpasse Portal largement, et on ne s'ennuie jamais.
super fun story lots of new stuff to discover and a very cool story

Portal 2 is one of the most innovating and best PC games of all time. If you are looking for a great game that is worth the price, it is definitely Portal 2, while the original Portal was a great game, Portal 2 expands on the fun and the creativity. If you would ask me how I will rate Portal 2, I will definitely give it a proud 9.5/10
